longdescription.p: An effort focused on providing a Gentoo sub-environment under Apple's MacOS X operating system. This effort is part of the Metapkg alliance.
longdescription.info: This project is mostly inactive at the moment. If you are interested in working on it, please do let us know!

body.p: Metapkg.org: a cooperative alliance between Gentoo, DarwinPorts and Fink to provide collections of freely-available software to MacOS X users.
Portage MacOS/BSD enhancements: stage1 (DRAFT): A GLEP work-in-progress to document needed extensions to Portage needed to seamlessly support MacOS and BSD platforms.
